title: A.D. Machico
text:
Associação Desportiva de Machico, or simply Machico is a sports club based in the city of <a href="Machico">Machico</a>, on the <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> island of <a href="Madeira">Madeira</a>.
They are notable mainly for their professional <a href="volleyball">volleyball</a> team ("See: <a href="A.D.%20Machico%20%28volleyball%29">A.D. Machico (volleyball)</a>") and for their <a href="Portuguese%20Second%20Division">Second Division</a> semi-professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team, who play their home games at the brand-new 3,300-seat capacity <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Municipal%20do%20Machico">Estádio Municipal do Machico</a>. The club also compete in others sports at amateur level in <a href="futsal">futsal</a>, <a href="karate">karate</a> and <a href="Swimming%20%28sport%29">swimming</a>.
